A burning tire soaked with gasoline was thrown at a building housing the Pregnancy Consultation Center and the Buena Vista Women's Center.
A fire was set at a family planning clinic in Ventura.
A fire broke out in a doctor's office in Santa Barbara.
A fire badly damaged a Planned Parenthood clinic in San Luis Obispo.
Flares were thrown onto the roof of a clinic in Santa Cruz.
Ricky Lee McDonald used chains, padlocks, and a burning shopping cart in 4 attempts to shut down a women's health clinic.
A fire was set to the Tidewater Women's Health Center, along with another clinic in Newport News, VA. Two were convicted.
A burning tire was forced through a window at an abortion clinic, leading to some damage.
A fire was set to the Peninsula Medical Center for Women in Newport News, along with another clinic in Norfolk VA. Two were convicted.
A “Molotov Cocktail” burned the doors and sidewalks, causing an estimated $10,000 worth of damage.
A firebomb severely damaged a Planned Parenthood office in Lancaster, Pa., that offers abortion referrals and family planning.
A clinic in Jackson, WY was bombed by Richard Thomas Andrews. He was later indicted for multiple attacks on clinics across several states.
Arson of Family Planning Clinic. Damages estimated at $75,000.
Two separate bomb incidents at the Reproductive Services and Adoption Affiliates clinic. A teenager was convicted in the bombing and his parents were charged.
A Falls Church abortion clinic was set on fire causing an estimated $25,000 in damages. James Mitchell sentenced to 10 years.
The roof of the Medical Arts Center where a doctor who performed abortions worked was set on fire. An anti-abortion activist was arrested.
An arson occurred at All Women's Health Services. Damages were estimated to be $5,000.
West Alabama Women's Center sustained $250,000 in damages, after a firebombing gutted the interior of the building
Lovejoy Surgicenter was set on fire and suffered $250,000 in damage, after receiving several bomb threats from 5/17-19.
Planned Parenthood of San Diego and Riverside Counties was firebombed. A white RV was spotted leaving the scene
An accelerant had been spread on the back door of the Carolina Women's Clinic and fire was set to the building.
Fire broke out at the Hallmark Clinic, damaging the roof and ceiling of the building, and resulting in smoke and water damage inside.
Summit Women's Health Organization's rear door was set on fire on two separate occasions.
Planned Parenthood of MN/SD was the target of an arson attack.
A fireplace log soaked with lighter fluid was lit on a window of the Planned Parenthood.
Fire was set to an abortion clinic by Ricky Lee McDonald, who had just been released from prison for another attack years before.
Benjamin Matthew Williams and James Tyler Williams set fire to several synagogues and an abortion clinic.
Feminist Health Center of Portsmouth, New Hampshire suffered fire and water damage in a suspected arson.
A container filled with an accelerant was thrown through the front door of Ft. Lauderdale Women's Clinic.
A fire was set to an abortion clinic in Concord, NH
The front door of the Planned Parenthood of South Central Michigan was smashed and fuel was spread throughout the lobby.
A flammable liquid was poured on the door and through the mail slot, and a fire was set.
An unknown perpetrator ignited a fire inside the Planned Parenthood. There were no casualties, but the clinic sustained $2,000 in damages.
The WomanCare Center burned down from what police believed to be a firebomb attack. No one was hurt, but the building was destroyed.
The fire started on the roof and destroyed much of the building's interior, but spared patient records.
A suspicious fire damaged an abortion clinic where protesters have staged weekly demonstrations for more than a decade.
An unidentified person deliberately set fire to a Planned Parenthood clinic.
Angry at his ex-girlfriend for planning to have an abortion, a man and his friend proceeded to set fire to the clinic.
Donny Eugene Mower committed arson at the Madera Planned Parenthood clinic, causing more than $26,000 in damage.
The Planned Parenthood clinic, which does not provide abortions, experienced an arson attack. There were no injuries.
Bobby Joe Rogers was sentenced to 10 years for arson and damaging a reproductive health facility.
A homeless man was sentenced to 10 years in federal prison Thursday for an arson attack against American Family Planning clinic.
A man convicted of starting a fire at a Planned Parenthood building in Grand Chute was sentenced to 11 years in prison.
Atlanta-area clinics specializing in women’s health services have witnessed three burglaries and now two fires.
Atlanta-area clinics specializing in women’s health services have witnessed three burglaries and now two fires.
A fire was set outside the front door of Planned Parenthood.
The New Orleans Fire Department investigated a morning car fire at the construction site for a new Planned Parenthood clinic in New Orleans.
The Planned Parenthood health center in Pullman, Washington, was set on fire and burned for several hours, causing extreme damage.
Arsonist or arsonists broke a window and splashed gasoline inside the Planned Parenthood clinic before igniting it.
Four people were convicted of conspiring in the bombing of the clinic and a bank robbery.
Three white separatists were convicted for multiple bombings and bank robberies in the Spokane area, including a Planned Parenthood.
Two separate bomb incidents at the Reproductive Services and Adoption Affiliates clinic. A teenager was convicted in the bombing and his parents were charged.
A bomb destroyed most of the clinic. The second bomb was designed to kill rescue, law enforcement, and clinic staff. 7 injured.
A “Molotov Cocktail” was thrown through a window at the Family Planning Assoc. Medical Group causing $1,000 in damage.
An anti-abortion activist was arrested for setting fire to the building housing the office of Dr. Susan Wicklund.
The Piedmont-Carolina Medical clinic was set on fire causing $50,000 in damage.
A pick-up truck loaded with 13 gas cans and 3 propane tanks was rammed into the clinic, then set on fire.
A police officer was killed and a nurse was severely injured. Eric Rudolph, who also set off bombs in Atlanta, admitted responsibility.
source_link: Wikipedia - Anti Abortion Violence - Murders in US

description: Eric Rudolph killed a security guard at an abortion clinic. He was also responsible for detonating bombs in Atlanta.
An explosive device went off outside Femcare clinic, but caused no injuries and little damage, as it only partially detonated.
A Planned Parenthood clinic was damaged by an explosive device in the early morning hours.
An explosive device went off at a medical clinic where a doctor occasionally performed abortions.
A bomb was left outside an Austin women's clinic that performs abortions.
A priest drove his car into a clinic, and then preceded to hit the building with an ax until the owner fired his gun twice to stop him.
The man accused of driving into the entrance of the Planned Parenthood clinic in St. Paul told police that Jesus told him to do it.
A man took an ax to a Planned Parenthood clinic in Bloomington, Indiana, and then vandalized it with red paint. No one was injured.
All Families Healthcare, the only facility in the area to provide abortions, was ransacked. The clinic owner closed her business after.
A man accused of removing signs at a clinic in Metairie, Louisiana, was charged with committing a hate crime.
An intruder used a hatchet to destroy computers, plumbing fixtures, phones, and medical equipment inside a Planned Parenthood clinic.
Dr. David Gunn was fatally shot during a protest. He had been the subject of wanted-style posters distributed by Operation Rescue.
source_link: Wikipedia - Anti Abortion Violence - Murders in US

description: Dr. John Britton and James Barrett, a clinic escort, were both shot to death outside a clinic.
source_link: Wikipedia - Anti Abortion Violence - Murders in US

description: Shannon Lowney and Lee Ann Nichols were killed and five others were wounded in two clinic attacks.
A sniper shot at Dr. David Gandell's residence in Rochester, New York. Gandell is a well-known abortion provider.
Dr. Barnett Slepian, who performed abortions, was shot to death by a sniper in his western New York home.
Dr. George Tiller  was killed outside of his church. Tiller had been shot before by an anti-abortion extremist in 1993.
Officer Garrett Swasey, Ke’Arre Stewart and Jennifer Markovsky were killed in an attack. Nine others were injured, including 5 officers.
source_link: Wikipedia - Anti Abortion Violence - Murders in US

description: Dr. Calvin Jackson was stabbed 15 times, losing 14 pints of blood, outside the Orleans Womens Clinic. The man served no jail time.
